## [Angry Birds](#angry-birds)

### Description
A popular mobile game where you launch birds at pigs using a slingshot.

![Game Image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XQuestCode/SplashkitGames/main/angry-birds/template.gif)


Language - `cpp` 	
Rating - `3`

### Command
```cpp

clang++ program.cpp -l SplashKit -o program && ./program
```

<button onclick="window.open('https://download-directory.github.io?url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XQuestCode/SplashkitGames/tree/main/angry-birds/', '_blank')">Download</button>

---



## [Asteroids](#asteroids)

### Description
A classic arcade game where you pilot a spaceship and destroy asteroids.

![](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/760bb8f8-3a05-4e44-be4d-6d1b2a6e5392/d1nno8d-364adddf-a168-44a1-b5e5-db7e2e779331.gif?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..SIYcpgo6CrC3ucFcFCIAxRYhR-hFZK_0_NJlE7Z_67I)


Language - `csharp` 	
Rating - `4`

### Command
```csharp

dotnet run
```

<button onclick="window.open('https://download-directory.github.io?url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XQuestCode/SplashkitGames/tree/main/asteroids/', '_blank')">Download</button>

---



## [DxBallGame](#dxballgame)

### Description
A classic arcade game where you control a paddle to bounce a ball and break bricks.

![Game Image](https://images.sftcdn.net/images/t_app-cover-l,f_auto/p/0f5173aa-96da-11e6-9405-00163ec9f5fa/4242823519/dx-ball-2-screenshot.jpg)


Language - `cpp` 	
Rating - `4`

### Command
```cpp

clang++ program.cpp -l SplashKit -o program && ./program
```

<button onclick="window.open('https://download-directory.github.io?url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XQuestCode/SplashkitGames/tree/main/dx-ball/', '_blank')">Download</button>

## [Road Runner](#road-runner)

### Description
A classic arcade game where you control a car and avoid obstacles.

![](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/760bb8f8-3a05-4e44-be4d-6d1b2a6e5392/d1nno8d-364adddf-a168-44a1-b5e5-db7e2e779331.gif?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..SIYcpgo6CrC3ucFcFCIAxRYhR-hFZK_0_NJlE7Z_67I)


Language - `cpp` 	
Rating - `3`

### Command
```cpp

clang++ program.cpp -l SplashKit -o program && ./program
```

<button onclick="window.open('https://download-directory.github.io?url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XQuestCode/SplashkitGames/tree/main/road-runner/', '_blank')">Download</button>
